name: part_003
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】あくあ色ふぇすてぃばる。【#湊あくあ4周年記念】 [O4Ip7gZQOts]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Minato Aqua introduces the guest section of her 4th-anniversary 3DLIVE.
Transition screens introducing the guests and the upcoming song.
MC section featuring Minato Aqua, Hoshimachi Suisei, and Tokoyami Towa (Startend).

subtitles.original: ここからはゲストがどんどん出てくるので、お楽しみに！
subtitles.english: From here on, guests will be appearing one after another, so look forward to it!

subtitles.original: うおおおおおお！！！
subtitles.english: Wooooooo!!!

subtitles.original: 常闇トワ
subtitles.english: Tokoyami Towa

subtitles.original: 星街すいせい
subtitles.english: Hoshimachi Suisei

subtitles.original: 湊あくあ
subtitles.english: Minato Aqua

subtitles.original: NEXT SONG
subtitles.english: NEXT SONG

subtitles.original:
三原色
湊あくあ 星街すいせい 常闇トワ
subtitles.english:
Sangenshoku
Minato Aqua, Hoshimachi Suisei, Tokoyami Towa

subtitles.original: どこかで途切れた物語
subtitles.english: A story that was cut off somewhere

subtitles.original: 僕らもう一度その先へ
subtitles.english: We're heading beyond that once more

subtitles.original: たとえ何度離れてしまってもほら
subtitles.english: Even if we're separated many times, look

subtitles.original: 繋がっている
subtitles.english: We're connected

subtitles.original: それじゃまたね 交わした言葉
subtitles.english: "See ya then," the words we exchanged

subtitles.original: あれから幾つ朝日を見たんだ
subtitles.english: How many sunrises have I seen since then?

subtitles.original: それぞれの暮らしの先で
subtitles.english: At the end of our respective lives

subtitles.original: あの日の続き 再会の日
subtitles.english: The continuation of that day, the day of our reunion

subtitles.original: 待ち合わせまでの時間がただ
subtitles.english: The time until our meeting just

subtitles.original: 過ぎてゆく度に胸が高鳴る
subtitles.english: The more it passes, the more my heart beats faster

subtitles.original: 雨上がりの空見上げれば
subtitles.english: When I look up at the sky after the rain

subtitles.original: あの日と同じように
subtitles.english: Just like that day

subtitles.original: 架かる七色の橋
subtitles.english: A seven-colored bridge hangs

subtitles.original: ここでもう一度出会えたんだよ
subtitles.english: We were able to meet here once more

subtitles.original: 僕ら繋がっていたんだずっと
subtitles.english: We've been connected all along

subtitles.original: 話したいこと 伝えたいこと
subtitles.english: Things I want to talk about, things I want to convey

subtitles.original: 溢れて止まらないから
subtitles.english: They're overflowing and won't stop

subtitles.original: ほら ほどけてゆく
subtitles.english: Look, they're unraveling

subtitles.original: 巡る季節に急かされて
subtitles.english: Hurried by the turning seasons

subtitles.original: 続く道のその先また
subtitles.english: Further ahead on the continuing path

subtitles.original: 離れたってさ 何度だってさ
subtitles.english: Even if we part, any number of times

subtitles.original: 強く結び直したなら また会える
subtitles.english: If we tie our bonds strongly again, we'll meet again

subtitles.original: 変わってしまったことだって
subtitles.english: Even things that have changed

subtitles.original: 本当はきっと幾つもある
subtitles.english: Truthfully, I'm sure there are many

subtitles.original: だけど
subtitles.english: But

subtitles.original: 今日だってあけないほどあの頃のままで
subtitles.english: Even today, it's just like those days, as if they never ended

subtitles.original: 気付けば空は白み始め
subtitles.english: Before I knew it, the sky began to turn white

subtitles.original: 疲れ果てた僕らの背後に
subtitles.english: Behind our exhausted selves

subtitles.original: 触れる陽の光 温かさ
subtitles.english: The sunlight touching us, the warmth

subtitles.original: あの日と同じように
subtitles.english: Just like that day

subtitles.original: それぞれの日常に帰る
subtitles.english: Returning to our respective daily lives

subtitles.original: ねえここまで歩いてきた道は
subtitles.english: Hey, the path we've walked so far

subtitles.original: それぞれ違うけれど
subtitles.english: Is different for each of us, but

subtitles.original: 同じ朝日に今照らされてる
subtitles.english: We're being shone upon by the same morning sun now

subtitles.original: また重なり合えたんだ
subtitles.english: We were able to overlap once again

subtitles.original: どこかで途切れた物語
subtitles.english: A story that was cut off somewhere

subtitles.original: 僕らもう一度その先へ
subtitles.english: We're heading beyond that once more

subtitles.original: 話したいこと 伝えたいこと
subtitles.english: Things I want to talk about, things I want to convey

subtitles.original: ページを埋めてゆくように
subtitles.english: As if filling up the pages

subtitles.original: ほら 書き足そうよ 何度でも
subtitles.english: Look, let's add to it, as many times as it takes

subtitles.original: いつか見上げた赤い夕日も
subtitles.english: The red sunset we looked up at one day

subtitles.original: 共に過ごした青い月日も
subtitles.english: The blue days we spent together

subtitles.original: 忘れないから 消えやしないから
subtitles.english: I won't forget them, they won't disappear

subtitles.original: 緑が芽吹くように また会えるから
subtitles.english: Like the green sprouting, because we can meet again

subtitles.original: 物語は白い朝日から始まる
subtitles.english: The story begins with the white morning sun

subtitles.original: また明日
subtitles.english: See you tomorrow

subtitles.original: はーい！ということで！Startendの二人が来てくれましたー！
subtitles.english: Hi~! So! Both of Startend have come!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: ありがとうー！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: おとといぶり。
subtitles.english: It's been since the day before yesterday.

subtitles.original: おとといぶりだ、そうだ。
subtitles.english: The day before yesterday, that's right.

subtitles.original: おとといっていうのか？おとといぶりか。
subtitles.english: Do you call it the day before yesterday? Since the day before yesterday.

subtitles.original: おととい…あれ？なんかさー…
subtitles.english: The day before yesterday... huh? It's like...

subtitles.original: 「また会えたんだね」とか言ってさ、実はもう会ってましたみたいな…
subtitles.english: We said things like "We were able to meet again," but actually we'd already met...

subtitles.original: さっき会ってたみたいなね。
subtitles.english: Like we just met a while ago.

subtitles.original: すみません、さっきまで。
subtitles.english: Sorry, just until a moment ago.

subtitles.original: でも、エモかった。エモかったことだ。
subtitles.english: But it was emotional. It was an emotional thing.

subtitles.original: そうだそうだ。
subtitles.english: True, true.

subtitles.original: ね、あくたんの記念日とトワのちょっと周年祭がね、同じということで！
subtitles.english: Right, Akutan's anniversary and Towa's anniversary festival are the same!

subtitles.original: おめでとうございますー！
subtitles.english: Congratulations~!

subtitles.original: おめでとうございます。同じ日なんですよ。
subtitles.english: Congratulations. It's the same day.

subtitles.original: あ、ついに、ついにここで共通点が！
subtitles.english: Ah, finally, finally a common point here!

subtitles.original: 待って待って、あくあ先輩が…あ…
subtitles.english: Wait, wait, Aqua-senpai... ah...
